snippet: A New York City newspaper caused a stir by publishing a photograph of a man trapped on a subway platform seconds before an oncoming train killed him. What do you think about their choice?
abstract: A New York City newspaper caused a stir by publishing a photograph of a man trapped on a subway platform seconds before an oncoming train killed him. What do you think about their choice?

byline.original: By MICHAEL GONCHAR and KATHERINE SCHULTEN

headline.main: Is It Wrong for a Newspaper to Publish a Front-Page Photo of a Man About to Die?
